TopicTitle: [1.0.5] [RELEASE 0.8] Sido's Urania System : 7 new planets and 8 moons !

Texture replacer Mod

Bump

Need sauce

How did you get the oceans working? I'm having a horrible time trying to make them actually work and not completely submerge the entire planet.

Also, where did you get your textures? They're gorgeous!

I made the texture myself with toshop based on spaceengine export.

For the ocean you need to specified "hasOcean=true" in your cfg

Any plans to release the aurora as a separate addon for stock Kerbin?

Done, i put the download link on the first page.

Update aurora for more "wave" effect.

Link always in the first page
Any plans to add custom biome maps for use with the custom biomes plugin?

Any plans to add custom biome maps for use with the custom biomes plugin?

Well, i see there's a mod for doing that so i planned this in the futur yes.

I'm waiting to have a maximum feedback to my pack for stabilize it in a stable version and after that i planned to made some biomap for each celestial bodies
Is the Aurora there constantly, or only sometimes? It'd be a little weird for it to be there constantly.

Well, it's like the clouds, it depends of the clouds mod, so it's always here

but you can remove it by edit your cloud's cfg file of course.
Yay, 0.3! Although still no SOI reduction

I don't reduce the SOi of each planet.

I rise the planet orbit.

I play with this system every day and i don't have any of the problem with the v 0.1

tell me if you've got problem to reach a planet or if you discover orbit glitch

The problem I had is the way I end up being plucked from one orbit and shot into another as SOIs overlap. Increasing the distances between them would help alot I crossed the Urania system without ever entering Uranias SOI. Hyperion should probably get nerfed too, it encompasses a huge part of the system.
Ok, i'll worked on this for a futur version. thanks for your feedback.

Ok, i'll worked on this for a futur version. thanks for your feedback.

Your welcome, and thanks for the great mod!

Thx Sido for you mod ! And thank you for your e-mail.

I'm experiencing some trouble with science archive (I guess it's related to your awesome pack). Do you know about this issue?
